original_text: The Jewish leaders agreed with Gamaliel. They told the apostles to come back into the room. They told the police to hit them with whips. Then they said to the apostles, ‘You must not use the authority of Jesus to teach the people.’ After that, they let the apostles go free.
korean_text: 그들이 옳게 여겨 사도들을 불러들여 채찍질하며 예수의 이름으로 말하는 것을 금하고 놓으니

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders agreed with Gamaliel.
They told the apostles to come back into the room.
They told the police to hit them with whips.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 경찰에게 그들을 채찍으로 치라고 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then they said to the apostles,
'You must not use the authority of Jesus
After that, they let the apostles go free.
